name: copilotprompts-communication-assistant
title: Communication Assistant for a Kinder World
shortDescription: This prompt helps you to communicate in a more kind and empathetic way embodying Microsoft's Responsible AI principles.
longDescription: This Communication Assistant for a Kinder World aims to deeply embody Microsoft's Responsible AI principles, especially Inclusiveness, Fairness, and Reliability and Safety. I believe in using AI ethically to foster communication where people respect each other, contributing to a better society.
